reviewText: I love Andy Garcia and Ellen Barkin.  This is one of the best movies I have seen.  I've watched it several times.
I am a huge Andy Garcia fan. This is a great movie. Ellen Barkin is wonderful in this one too. Their chemistry is great. Fun to watch.
This is probably one of the earliest movies of Andy Garcia. He was so young and cute. The story is interesting. Ellen Barkin and Morgan Freeman are in this movies too. A good movie to watch.

This is a story of revenge.
  There is a good guy and a good gal.
  A whole bunch of bad guys.
  A nice dog.
  A cute baby boy.
  Lots of great actors.
  SPOILER ALERT
  The good guy punks out at the last minute {literally} and drives off into the sunset {literally} with the good gal and a piano {literally} leaving behind the nice dog and presumably the cute baby with grandma.
 I bought this DVD.
 Why?
 I don't know.
 One star for the terrific song "It Makes Me Cry" sung by Deborah Allen during the sunset credit roll.
